name: Jean-Philippe Maquestiaux
title: Senior Application Architect
tagline: Passionate about software architecture, design patterns, and clean code. Experienced in delivering high-quality software solutions.
about: Experienced Senior Application Architect with a strong background in software design and development. Skilled  designing scalable architectures, and implementing best practices to deliver high-quality software solutions. Passionate about clean code, design patterns, and continuous learning. More than 25 years of experience in the IT industry, working across various domains and technologies.
